title: ASKA
description:
Lay claim to unspoiled lands and pave the way for a fierce Viking tribe. Craft the ultimate settlement solo or together with up to x3 friends. Trust in the Gods and the power of the Eye of Odin and summon intelligent NPC villagers to provide camaraderie and relief from the toils of survival.
In ASKA, strive to build a self-sustaining Viking tribe, working, crafting, hunting and fighting together. Command and organize intelligent NPC villagers, working and fighting alongside them. Go-Go Town!

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5 6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660 (6GB) or AMD RX 590
